title: Petrified Forest National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar        Las Joyas del Desierto at the Cultural Art Market NPS           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 20 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Petrified Forest National Park Find Your Park, Share Your Story	      Location: findyourpark.com/share Fees: None     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 06/01/2016 to 08/31/2016 Celebrate National Park Service’s Centennial by sharing your own story! Upload your own song, photo, painting, poem, dance, video—anything you’d like to share about your fabulous Petrified Forest visit at Find Your Park website, findyourpark.com/share. View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Geocaching      Location: Throughout the Park Fees: Entrance Fee     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 01/01/2016 to 12/31/2016 Geocaching is a worldwide game of hide and seek. Anyone with a GPS device can play! There are several geocaches at Petrified Forest National Park. View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Junior Ranger Program      Location: Throughout Park Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 01/01/2016 to 12/31/2016 Junior Rangers explore, learn about, and protect their national parks! View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Painted Desert Inn Tour      Location: Painted Desert Inn NHL Fees: Park entrance fee     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 05/22/2016 to 08/31/2016 Personal tours made to order View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Reptile Blitz      Time: 6:00 PM to 11:00 PM Location: Throughout the park Fees: No fee     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Engage in real ‘citizen science’ at the park! For several nights staff and volunteers will drive, bike, and walk along a multi-mile section of park road to gather biological diversity data. View Details      Petrified Forest National Park The Living Park Talk      Time: 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM,1:30 PM to 2:00 PM Location: Painted Desert Visitor Center Fees: No fee     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 06/12/2016 to 08/31/2016 There is life in the park and it is thriving! Enjoy an introduction about plants and animals that call Petrified Forest home! Hand-on items. Allow 30 minutes. View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Triassic Talk      Location: Crystal Forest sun shelter Fees: Park entrance fee     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Everyday  from 06/12/2016 to 08/31/2016 Discover how Petrified Forest came to be by going back in time to the Late Triassic, over 200 million years ago! View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Dig Fossils For a Day      Time: 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM Location: Petrified Forest Fees: Institute fee     Saturday, August 13, 2016 This program is offered by Petrified Forest Field Institute. This one day excursion provides an introduction to paleontology field work! This is a real paleontological dig with collected specimens becoming part of the park’s museum collection. View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Meet an Archeologist      Time: 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM Location: Newspaper Rock Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Our park’s own ‘archeologist Amy’ is roving Newspaper Rock and wants to talk with you!  View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Long Exposures, Short on Light: The Painted Desert at Dusk      Location: Petrified Forest Fees: Institute Fee     Thursday, August 18, 2016 This program is offered by Petrified Forest Field Institute. A workshop for intermediate and advanced photographers, learn to use low light to create spectacular landscape shots.  View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Centennial Celebration: Parks in the Pines      Time: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Flagstaff City Hall, Flagstaff Fees: n/a     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Help Arizona’s National Parks celebrate its centennial! We'll have a fair in downtown Flagstaff Saturday August 20th, 2016. Check out all 22 park units here in Arizona. View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Hands-on Biology: Reptiles and Amphibians–Daytime      Time: 7:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Throughout the park Fees: Institute fee     Tuesday, August 23, 2016 This program is offered by Petrified Forest Field Institute. The many habitats of Petrified Forest National Park support a large variety of plants and animals. Join park biologist Andy Bridges for a hands-on experience with reptiles and amphibians. View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Hands-on Biology: Reptiles and Amphibians–Nighttime      Time: 7:00 PM to 12:00 AM Location: Petrified Forest Fees: Institute fee     Tuesday, August 23, 2016 This program is offered by Petrified Forest Field Institute. Only after the park closes and the roads are clear can you see many of the animals that call Petrified Forest home. Join park biologist Andy Bridges for a hands-on experience. View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Meet an Archeologist      Time: 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM Location: Along the Puerco Pueblo Trail Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Tuesday, August 23, 2016 Our park’s own ‘archeologist Amy’ is roving the Puerco Pueblo area and wants to talk with you!  View Details      Petrified Forest National Park National Park Service 100th birthday today!      Time: 7:00 AM to 7:00 PM Location: Petrified Forest National Park Fees: Fee Free Day     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Celebrate the 100th anniversary of the creation of the National Park Service, right here at Petrified Forest National Park!  View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Petroglyph Galleries of Ancient Occupation      Time: 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Petrified Forest National Park Fees: Institute fee     Friday, August 26, 2016 This program is offered by Petrified Forest Field Institute: Petrified Forest National Park offers some of the most spectacular petroglyph galleries in North America!  View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Hands-On Archeology: Recording Rock Art      Time: 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: This program is offered by Petrified Forest Field Institute and an additional fee is required; see http://www.petrifiedforestfieldinstitute.org/ for additional information. New lands recently added to the park include dozens of previously unrecorded petro Fees: Institute fee     Saturday, August 27, 2016 This program is offered by Petrified Forest Field Institute. Participants will learn and employ archaeological methods for recording and documenting rock art under the direction of NPS archaeologists. View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Storms and Sunsets: A Photographic Exploration (5.5 hours)      Time: 1:30 PM to 7:00 PM Location: Petrified Forest Field Institute     Sunday, August 28, 2016 Join renowned photographer Gary Ladd on a photographic exploration of light and shadow, visiting and shooting Petrified Forest in summer monsoon light! View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Storms and Sunsets: A Photographic Exploration (3.5 hours)      Time: 3:30 PM to 7:00 PM Location: Petrified Forest Field Institute     Monday, August 29, 2016 Join renowned photographer Gary Ladd on a photographic exploration of light and shadow, visiting and shooting Petrified Forest in summer monsoon light! View Details      Petrified Forest National Park Meet an Archeologist      Time: 10:00 AM to 4:30 PM Location: Agate House Trail Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Tuesday, August 30, 2016 Our park’s own ‘archeologist Amy’ is roving the Agate House Trail and wants to talk with you! Find Amy along the trail and at Agate House to learn why Petrified Forest has been home to people for over 13,000 years. View Details
